synopsis.text: Clearing fortresses single-handedly and wielding magic that leaves both allies and enemies in awe, Ike is hailed as the most formidable magician in the Demon King's army. His immense power paints him as a fearsome monster, yet he harbors a secret that could shatter this terrifying image: he is not a demon, but a human. As the leader of the demon army, Ike strives for a harmonious existence between demons and humans while concealing his true identity. Utilizing modern knowledge from Earth, he has become an influential commander and the driving force behind the Demon King's army.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
